inclusion.criterion: Mild-to-moderate CLN3 disease documented by UBDRS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant can independently walk for a distance of at least 20 feet
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant can tolerate swallowing oral medication or has gastric/jejunostomy tube
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant's parents/guardians agree to comply with study conditions
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically documented generalized motor status epilepticus within 4 weeks of Baseline visit
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, but her age and CLN3 disease diagnosis make her eligible for the study. However, she has asymptomatic CLN3 disease, which makes her not eligible.
